channel.title: CVE Feed for Check Point Software Technologies Ltd. -- FreeRDP
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Check Point Software Technologies Ltd. -- FreeRDP

item.title: CVE-2018-8786|2024-09-17T01:56:15.397Z -- check%20point%20software%20technologies%20ltd. -- freerdp
item.description: FreeRDP prior to version 2.0.0-rc4 contains an Integer Truncation that leads to a Heap-Based Buffer Overflow in function update_read_bitmap_update() and results in a memory corruption and probably even a remote code execution.

item.title: CVE-2018-8784|2024-09-17T01:55:43.145Z -- check%20point%20software%20technologies%20ltd. -- freerdp
item.description: FreeRDP prior to version 2.0.0-rc4 contains a Heap-Based Buffer Overflow in function zgfx_decompress_segment() that results in a memory corruption and probably even a remote code execution.
